title: Daily Practices
description: Practices performed daily to maintain focus, quality, and alignment
philosophy: Each day is an opportunity to serve well and grow in craft.

practices.name: Morning Intention Setting
practices.purpose: Begin each day with clarity of purpose and focused intention

steps.guidance: What tasks will create the most value for stakeholders today?
How does today's work serve our mission?
What might prevent excellent work today? How to address it?
Commit to the standard of craftsmanship you will maintain

reflection_prompts: Where is attention to detail most important today?

practices.name: Evening Reflection
practices.purpose: End each day with gratitude and learning

steps.guidance: What was completed today? What value was delivered?
What was difficult? How was it handled?
What did today teach? How to apply tomorrow?
What enabled good work today? Who helped?

reflection_prompts: Did today's work serve our purpose?
Where did I see excellence? Where could I improve?
What am I grateful for in today's work?

practices.name: Focused Stand-up
practices.purpose: Align team, identify blockers, maintain momentum

steps.guidance: What was completed? What value was delivered to stakeholders?
What will you work on? How does it serve our mission?
What obstacles need team help to resolve?
How can you support teammates today?

reflection_prompts: Is the team moving toward our success criteria?
Are we maintaining quality or cutting corners?
Is anyone struggling who needs support?
